pl.wipek.client

Class RelationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.wipek.client.RelationHelper

  • public class RelationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Krszysztof Adamczyk on 03.05.2017. managing hibernate relation on client side fetch eager is too slow so client must request to server with every relation
